news.Title: BETA3 RELEASED !
news.Description:
Changelog :
- New gameplay element : the storm. A storm will arrive and make the game more difficult after a while
- Shop redesign : new character, new background, new UI
- News, settings and discord panels
- 3 new skins
- Leaderboard redesign
- Skins and news can now be modified without the need to build the game again
Lots of code improvements
-/!\ Music is not enabled by default, you need to modify the music slider in the settings. This bug will be fixed in beta4.
